    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      TextArea​(java.lang.String caption)
      Same function as the previous constructor except the size of the rectangle is hard-coded at 600x500
      TextArea​(java.lang.String caption, boolean timelineView)
      TextArea is created with the appropriate dimensions for a timelineView
      TextArea​(java.lang.String caption, double photoHeight)
      caption initialized to given String The height of the photo is given so the size of the TextArea can be sized appropriately

    • Constructor Detail

      • TextArea

        public TextArea​(java.lang.String caption,
                double photoHeight)
        caption initialized to given String The height of the photo is given so the size of the TextArea can be sized appropriately
        Parameters:
        caption - The caption of the post that this instance is associated with
        photoHeight - The height of the photo that this instance is associated with

      • TextArea

        public TextArea​(java.lang.String caption)
        Same function as the previous constructor except the size of the rectangle is hard-coded at 600x500
        Parameters:
        caption - The caption of the post that this instance is associated with

      • TextArea

        public TextArea​(java.lang.String caption,
                boolean timelineView)
        TextArea is created with the appropriate dimensions for a timelineView
        Parameters:
        caption - The caption of the post that this instance is associated with
        timelineView - indicates that this instance should have the dimensions for a timelineView

        comment - the content of the comment

                        java.lang.String[] comments)
        Adds multiple comments to this TextArea
        Parameters:
        people - list of people who left comments
        comments - list of comments that were left
